question: Which city was named the cleanest in the recently released Swachh Survekshan League 2020 results?
explanation: According to the central governmentâ€™s cleanliness survey, Indore is declared to be the cleanest city in India for the fourth time in a row. Kolkata is designated as the worst performer. It the category of cities having population more than 10 lakh, Bhopal stood second in the first quarter of the result and Rajkot got the second spot in the second quarter of the results.
